This class represents menus which can be used to add, remove and choose service items.

menuController - Variable in class hrps.boundary.ServiceUI
To access and update menu items' data.
MenuController - Class in hrps.control
This class represent controller that contains all methods related to menu, includes creating new menu items, searching, updating and removing existed menu items, and also update the menu and the menu items on the database.
MenuController - Static variable in class hrps.control.MenuController
The static controller instance to avoid multiple instantiations.
MenuController() - Constructor for class hrps.control.MenuController
Initialize MenuController by reading from menu data file, if the data file does not exist at the given path, create it and write the on-memory menu data to the newly created file.
MenuItem - Class in hrps.entity
This class represents menu items that can be ordered by guest.
MenuItem(String, String, double) - Constructor for class hrps.entity.MenuItem
